ComicInfo.Summary:
“Chasing Phantoms,” Part 2! One ally close to the Turtles faces grave danger while another makes a choice that will alter his life forever. Meanwhile the Turtles wonder if their path truly lies with the Foot Clan…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Wachter | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Goran Sudzuka (a) & Miroslav Mrva (c) | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 4 | RE | Blindbox Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 300 (Casey Jones) | Robert Atkins (a), Simon Gough (a) & Chuck Arnold (a) | 5-6 | RE | Blindbox Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 600 (Raphael) | Robert Atkins (a), Simon Gough (a) & Chuck Arnold (a) | 7-8 | RE | Blindbox Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 (Vintage Raphael) | Robert Atkins (a), Simon Gough (a) & Chuck Arnold (a) | 9 | RE | London Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Dan Hammond | 10 |
